sentences.en: Good manners are very important in a momentous occasion.
sentences.cn: 在重要的场合有礼貌是很重要的.

sentences.en: His colleagues all recognized that this was a momentous occasion .
sentences.cn: 他的同事都认识到这是一个重要时刻。

sentences.en: I am deeply honoured to be invited to this momentous occasion.
sentences.cn: 能应邀出席如此重要的场合,我深感荣幸.

sentences.en: I rejoice that you will be at my side in momentous times.
sentences.cn: 将来到重要的时刻,你将在我的身边,这使我很高兴.

sentences.en: I've a feeling this week that something momentous is going to happen.
sentences.cn: 我这个星期 老 是觉得有一件什么严重的事要发生似的.

sentences.en: In that year, two momentous discoveries were made.
sentences.cn: 那一年，有两个重大发现。

sentences.en: It was the most momentous thing on earth for us all.
sentences.cn: 对我们大家来说,那是人世间头等大事.

sentences.en: Momentous events are taking place in the US.
sentences.cn: 美国正在发生重大事件。

sentences.en: Mr Verba's gentle preamble through leather - bound tradition was leading to something momentous.
sentences.cn: 维巴先生就哈佛藏书所作的温文尔雅的开场白,将拉开重大事件的帷幕.

sentences.en: Not all such failures, of course, are as historically momentous.
sentences.cn: 当然并不是所有的这种失败都是历史的重要时刻.

sentences.en: Not all who had been at the momentous boardroom session left as speedily as Roscoe Heyward.
sentences.cn: 在董事会议室参加这次重要会议的人并不都象罗斯科·海沃德那样一散会就赶紧拔腿溜走.

sentences.en: one of the most momentous days in British sport
sentences.cn: 英国体育事业最重要的日子之一

sentences.en: The attempt was attended by the most momentous results.
sentences.cn: 这一尝试取得了重大成果.

sentences.en: The DLL is established, which have a momentous significance to further development.
sentences.cn: 建立了动态连接库文件, 对软件使用者在该软件基础上做二次开发具有相当重要的意义.

sentences.en: The momentous news was that war had begun.
sentences.cn: 重大的新闻是战争已经开始.

sentences.en: The past three years have been among the most momentous in world history.
sentences.cn: 过去的3年是世界历史上最重要的时期之一。

sentences.en: This is rare and representative of his momentous spirit.
sentences.cn: 这或许是作者胸中汹涌浩荡气势的溢露.

sentences.en: Whether the momentous decision was wise or foolish will be long debated by historians.
sentences.cn: 这种重大决定究竟是英明还是糊涂,历史学家将长期争论.

words.tran_cn: 重要，契机；瞬间；重要时刻；指定时刻

trans.tran_en: a momentous event, change, or decision is very important because it will have a great influence on the future
